trans-unit.source: Provides a set of properties, such as flow direction, alignment, or indentation, that can be applied to a paragraph.
This is an abstract class.

To create a text layout application that uses the services of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> object, you must create a derived class that implements the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> abstract class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether a formatted line can always be collapsed.
`true` if the formatted line can always be collapsed; otherwise, `false`, which indicates that only formatted lines that overflow the paragraph width are collapsed.
The default value is `false`.
Gets the default incremental tab distance.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> value that represents the default incremental tab distance.
Gets the default text run properties, such as typeface or foreground brush.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> value.
Gets a value that indicates whether the text run is the first line of the paragraph.
`true`, if the text run is the first line of the paragraph; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that specifies whether the primary text advance direction shall be left-to-right, or right-to-left.
An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
Gets the amount of line indentation.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents the amount of line indentation.
Gets the height of a line of text.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents the height of a line of text.
Gets the amount of the paragraph indentation.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents the amount of the paragraph indentation.
Gets a collection of tab definitions.
A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextTabProperties"></xref> objects.
Gets a value that describes how an inline content of a block is aligned.
An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"></xref>.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> objects.
A <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> value.
Gets a value that specifies marker characteristics of the first line in the paragraph.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextMarkerProperties"></xref> value.
Gets a value that controls whether text wraps when it reaches the flow edge of its containing block box.
An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.TextWrapping"></xref>.
